Text:
Thank you so much for this!
I just finished reading the x-men chronology and I was looking for avengers and spiderman!

So about the avengers chronology,YES PLEASE
@Keeper21 Could you tell me where you found the x-men chronology?

There  was an extensive X-Men chronology in 17 parts on Demonoid, so maybe that's the one? 

My landlord got mad at me because it caused me to exceed his ISP's tiny bandwidth cap.

You can find that X-Men Chronology on H33T now...

And I second the motion for an Avengers Chronology....and maybe make a motion for a Fantastic Four Chronology!

Thanks for these, they're great!!
